description: Ms. composite codex. Title from text 1. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on front flyleaves. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: Text 1, varying lines per page; written in small shikastah in black on machine-made paper; catchwords. Texts 2-3, 11 lines per page, in two columns; written in large naskh in black on machine-made paper; vocalized in red through leaf 182b; catchwords and headings in red; some marginal and interlinear notes. Occasional staining. Origin: Text 1, part 1, Shawwāl 1295 H [October 1878] (leaf 82a); part 2 likely completed soon afterward. Text 2, mid-Rabī I 1269 H [December 1852] (leaf 209b); text 3 likely completed soon afterward.
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻite law and Qurʼān readings.
contents: 1. fol. 3a-156a: [Parts 1-2 of Badāʼiʻ al-afkār] / Ḥabīb Allāh ibn Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Rashtī.
2. fol. 157b-209b: Manẓūmat al-Shāṭibī fī al-tajwīd / al-Qāsim ibn Fīrruh al-Shāṭibī.
3. fol. 210a-218b: [al-Durrah al-muḍīʼah fī qirāʼāt al-aʼimmah al-thalāthah al-marḍīyah] / Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Jazarī.
extent: 216 leaves : paper ; 217 x 175 (166-176 x 91-132) mm bound to 223 x 177 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, two notes, one of which is accompanied by a stamp, dated 1321 H [1903 or 1904].
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Full golden-brown leather with blind-stamped fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
